perturbation.original_text: Payment of the Royalty shall be made no later than 45 days after the termination of the preceding full calendar quarter.
perturbation.changed_text: Payment of the Royalty shall be made no later than 60 days after the termination of the preceding full calendar quarter.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text extends the payment deadline for royalties from 45 to 60 days after the quarter ends. This contradicts the original 45-day deadline, causing uncertainty and potential payment disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Bizzingo will pay all reasonable out of pocket expenses incurred by Theismann in connection with such session or appearance which expenses shall not exceed One Thousand Dollars ($1,000) per day unless Theismann receives prior written approval from Bizzingo.
perturbation.changed_text: Bizzingo will pay all reasonable out of pocket expenses incurred by Theismann in connection with such session or appearance which expenses shall not exceed Five Hundred Dollars ($500) per day unless Theismann receives prior written approval from Bizzingo.
perturbation.explanation: This change reduces the daily allowance for Theismann's out-of-pocket expenses from $1,000 to $500. This creates a direct conflict, making it unclear what the actual expense limit is and leading to potential disputes over reimbursement.

perturbation.original_text: Theismann shall have the right to terminate this Agreement at any time upon thirty (30) days' written notice to Bizzingo, such termination to become effective at the conclusion of such 30-day period.
perturbation.changed_text: Theismann shall have the right to terminate this Agreement only after 6 months upon thirty (30) days' written notice to Bizzingo, such termination to become effective at the conclusion of such 30-day period.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text adds a condition that Theismann can only terminate the agreement after 6 months, contradicting the original clause that allowed termination at any time. This introduces uncertainty about when Theismann can validly terminate the agreement.
